title: Protection of wiring systems and electrical equipment against mechanical damage
fullText:
Wiring systems and electrical equipment that are installed in a patient area shall be adequately protected against mechanical damage in accordance with AS/NZS 3000.
NOTE: Particular attention is drawn to the requirement of wiring systems that are fixed into position and concealed within 50 mm from the building surface for wiring and electrical equipment that is not LPD protected.
